## 配置免密
+ 密钥生成：【本地】使用命令`ssh-keygen -t rsa`，之后会在`Users/username/.ssh`下生成`id_rsa`以及`id_rsa.pub`，对应的是私钥和公钥。
+ 本地：打开`id_rsa.pub`文件，复制文件内容【文档下面用xxx代替该文件内容】
+ 服务器终端：运行命令

```plain
echo "ssh-rsa  sunyujie@LAPTOP-NRU3SMAH" >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
```

## claude code配置
```plain
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_lts.x | sudo bash -
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
node --version
npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code
claude --version
cd your-project-folder
export ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=sk-...
export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://jkmail.vip/
# (需要可以在vim ~/.bashrc中进行配置环境变量)
# 之后直接启动即可
claude
```

按照上图配置即可



```plain
curl https://glados.rocks/tools/clash-linux.zip -o clash.zip
unzip clash
cd clash#
curl https://update.glados-config.com/clash/235377/b451e11/148918/glados-terminal.yaml > glados.yaml
chmod +x ./clash-linux-amd64-v1.10.0
./clash-linux-amd64-v1.10.0 -f glados.yaml -d .
export http_proxy="127.0.0.1:7890"
```

## clash
```plain
curl https://glados.rocks/tools/clash-linux.zip -o clash.zip
unzip clash
cd clash#
curl https://update.glados-config.com/clash/235377/b451e11/148918/glados-terminal.yaml > glados.yaml
chmod +x ./clash-linux-amd64-v1.10.0
./clash-linux-amd64-v1.10.0 -f glados.yaml -d .
export http_proxy="127.0.0.1:7890"
```
